trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand"> </xref>, e <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event is raised when the `Cancel` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>evento é desencadeado quando o `Cancel` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> event is raised when the `Delete` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>evento é desencadeado quando o `Delete` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand> event is raised when the `Edit` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>evento é desencadeado quando o `Edit` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand> event is raised when any button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand>evento é desencadeado quando qualquer botão de um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically test for when a specific command button is clicked and take appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe programaticamente testar para quando se clica num botão de comando específico e execute as ações apropriadas.

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to handle custom command buttons for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é normalmente utilizado para processar botões de comando personalizados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand> event is raised when the `Update` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>evento é desencadeado quando o `Update` botão para um item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataListCommandEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado DataListCommandEventHandler, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os delegados do processador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
